title: Learning Golang Concurrency
details: Today I studied Golang's goroutines and tried implementing the producer-consumer pattern. I discovered that channel buffer size significantly impacts performance - unbuffered channels cause blocking while buffered channels can improve concurrent performance.

title: Deep Dive into React Server Components
details: I delved deep into how React Server Components work and understood why server-side rendering can reduce client-side bundle size. In Next.js 15, RSC implementation is more mature and supports more interactive patterns.

title: Advanced TypeScript Type Operations
summary: Learning Utility Types and Conditional Types
details: Today I studied advanced TypeScript type operations including Pick, Omit, Partial, Required utility types, and Conditional Types usage. These tools make the type system more flexible and powerful.

title: TailwindCSS 4 New Features
details: I researched TailwindCSS 4's new features including the new CSS engine, better developer experience, and integration with modern frontend frameworks. I particularly like the new @import syntax and better TypeScript support.

title: GitHub Actions Automated Deployment
summary: Setting up CI/CD pipeline to GitHub Pages
details: I configured GitHub Actions to automate the deployment process, including automatic Next.js project building, running tests, and deploying to GitHub Pages. I learned workflow syntax and best practices.
